purpose: Facilitate the deployment and management of AI agents on the Cloudflare platform, leveraging edge computing for scalable and efficient operations.
principle: Builds on Cloudflare Workers and Durable Objects to manage state and workflows across distributed environments.
reusability: Modular design with integration capabilities for Cloudflare's edge network, supports custom workflows and agent configurations.
limitations: Primarily designed for Cloudflare's ecosystem, may have limitations when used outside of Cloudflare's infrastructure.
name: agents
description: Build and deploy AI Agents on Cloudflare
highlight: Seamlessly deploy AI agents on Cloudflare's edge network using Durable Objects for state management.
